item.title: Fred Durst
item.description: William Frederick Durst is an American vocalist, actor and film director. He is best known as the frontman of the rap rock band Limp Bizkit, formed in 1994, with whom he released six studio albums. He started making money playing in several Jacksonville, Florida bands, mowing lawns and drawing tattoos.

item.title: Deryck Whibley
item.description: Deryck Jason Whibley, nicknamed Bizzy D, is a Canadian musician, singer, songwriter, and record producer, best known for his work as the lead vocalist, rhythm guitarist, keyboardist, main songwriter, and producer of the rock band Sum 41.

item.title: Noize MC
item.description: Noize MC is the stage name of Ivan Alexandrovich Alexeyev, a Russian singer, rapper and actor.
